msg: Creating an Abstract class for QueryRunner and AsyncQueryRunner. Also moving AsyncQueryRunner to a Callable rather than RunnableFuture API. Supplied by William Speirs in DBUTILS-78

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-5271: Client may hang if the server crashes due to a java.lang.Error
Tries to ensure that if the network server crashes due to a condition
raising java.lang.Error, the client socket will be closed on the server
side. Note that even if one of the worker threads crashes, the network
server itself may remain operational. If the JVM process dies, the
